name: Man's first dual
description:
A game made with UE5 and 100% blueprint. Because of architectural issues, the game is not complete, with many bugs remaining.A new similaire game is developping with Unity. What game IS :

The goal is to learn the Sekiro-like fighting. In this game, I have realized a part of Sekiro-fighting system such as All direction movement and dodge by blendspace, attack combo system and Sekiro-like parry system which can allow player to deflect enemy attack by Defense Button. If deflect moment is perfect, the player will totally ignore the damage of enemy and increase enemy's posture gauge. 

Gameplay :

W, S, A, D - Movement 

Left Shift - Dodge

Left Mouse - Attack

Right Mouse - Defense

Ressource :
  • GhostSamurai : Animations
  • Music and Sfx : Sekiro
  • VFX : Niagara Merge VFX pack
